comment: Whatever the flaws of the Republican Party as it stands, they are the only force on Earth capable of stopping our mortal enemies, the Democrats. We must help the Republicans to defeat the Democrats in order to earn our place in the power structure. If we turn on them, then we do not deserve the opportunity.
amr:
# ::snt Whatever the flaws of the Republican Party as it stands, they are the only force on Earth capable of stopping our mortal enemies, the Democrats. We must help the Republicans to defeat the Democrats in order to earn our place in the power structure. If we turn on them, then we do not deserve the opportunity.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (f / force
            :domain (p / political-party
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Republican"
                        :op2 "Party"))
            :mod (o / only)
            :ARG1-of (c / capable-01
                  :ARG2 (s / stop-01
                        :ARG0 f
                        :ARG1 (p2 / person
                              :ARG0-of (h / have-rel-role-91
                                    :ARG1 (w / we)
                                    :ARG2 (e / enemy
                                          :mod (m2 / mortal)))
                              :ARG1-of (m3 / mean-01
                                    :ARG2 (p3 / person
                                          :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                                                :ARG1 (p4 / political-party
                                                      :name (n2 / name
                                                            :op1 "Democrat"
                                                            :op2 "Party"))))))))
            :location (p5 / planet
                  :name (n3 / name
                        :op1 "Earth"))
            :concession (f2 / flaw-01
                  :ARG1 p))
      :snt2 (o2 / obligate-01
            :ARG1 (w2 / we)
            :ARG2 (h3 / help-01
                  :ARG0 w2
                  :ARG1 (d / defeat-01
                        :ARG0 p4
                        :ARG1 p3
                        :purpose (e2 / earn-01
                              :ARG0 w2
                              :ARG1 (p6 / place-01
                                    :ARG1 w2
                                    :ARG2 (s2 / structure
                                          :mod (p7 / power)))))
                  :ARG2 p4))
      :snt3 (d2 / deserve-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (w3 / we)
            :ARG1 (o3 / opportunity)
            :condition (t / turn-02
                  :ARG0 w3
                  :ARG1 p4)))

comment: Ably said. Participation in mainstream politics does not preclude metapolitics. It is fine if one thinks elections can never yield positive results, but there is no sense in the self-fulfilling pessimism of keeping out. Every rightist should cast a ballot for the best candidates available in each election, and then, if that does not work, we can say we tried our best.
amr:
# ::snt Ably said. Participation in mainstream politics does not preclude metapolitics. It is fine if one thinks elections can never yield positive results, but there is no sense in the self-fulfilling pessimism of keeping out. Every rightist should cast a ballot for the best candidates available in each election, and then, if that does not work, we can say we tried our best.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / say-01
            :manner (a / absolute))
      :snt2 (p / preclude-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (p2 / participate-01
                  :ARG1 (p3 / politics
                        :ARG1-of (m2 / mainstream-02)))
            :ARG1 (m3 / metapolitics))
      :snt3 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (f / fine-04
                  :ARG1 (t / think-01
                        :ARG0 (o / one)
                        :ARG1 (p4 / possible-01
                              :polarity -
                              :ARG1 (y / yield-01
                                    :ARG0 (e / elect-01)
                                    :ARG1 (r / result
                                          :mod (p5 / positive))
                                    :time (e2 / ever))))
                  :ARG2 (s2 / sense-02
                        :polarity -
                        :ARG1 (p6 / pessimism

                                    :ARG2 (s3 / self))
                              :mod (k / keep-out-06))))
            :snt4 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (r2 / recommend-01
                        :ARG1 (c2 / cast-01
                              :ARG0 (p7 / person
                                    :ARG1-of (r3 / right-08)
                                    :mod (e3 / every))
                              :ARG1 (b / ballot)
                              :purpose (c3 / candidate
                                    :ARG1-of (a3 / available-02
                                          :ARG2 (e4 / elect-01
                                                :mod (e5 / each))
                                          :ARG1-of (h / have-degree-91
                                                :ARG2 (g / good-03
                                                      :ARG1 c3)
                                                :ARG3 (m4 / most)))))
                        :op2 (p8 / possible-01
                              :ARG1 (s4 / say-01
                                    :ARG0 (w / we)
                                    :ARG1 (t2 / try-01
                                          :ARG0 w
                                          :ARG1 (g2 / good-03
                                                :ARG1 w
                                                :ARG2-of (h2 / have-degree-91
                                                      :ARG1 c3
                                                      :ARG3 (m5 / most))))
                                    :time (t3 / then)

comment: Language that attacks someones disorder is not allowed.

comment: Hey there, derogatory comments are not productive. Please refrain from using them and consider other peoples feelings when posting. Thanks
amr:
# ::snt Hey there, derogatory comments are not productive. Please refrain from using them and consider other peoples feelings when posting. Thanks
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / say-01
            :ARG1 (p / productive-03
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 (c / comment-01
                        :mod (d / derogatory))
                  :mod (h / hey
                        :mode expressive))
            :ARG2 (t / there))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (r / refrain-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :polite +
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (u / use-01
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG1 (t2 / they)))
            :op2 (c2 / consider-02
                  :mode imperative
                  :polite +
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (f / feel-01
                        :ARG0 (p2 / person
                              :mod (o / other)))
                  :time (p3 / post-01
                        :ARG0 y)))
      :snt3 (t3 / thank-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 y))
